name: MobileLink
0:
”Alexa open mobile link”
”Alexa, ask mobile link what is my generator status”
”Alexa, ask mobile link am I ready for a power outage”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mobile link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mobile Link, the affordable remote monitoring system, gives customers peace of mind by letting them check the status of their automatic home standby generator anywhere, and at any time. The app is now easier than ever to use, providing generator data, optimized for your device.

When configured with your generator, you can:
 • View current status and upcoming maintenance needs.
 • Remotely set the generator’s exercise schedule.
 • Review the generator’s run and maintenance history.
 • Receive push notifications that indicate changes in status.

Mobile Link service and the Mobile Link app work with select automatic home standby generators from Generac, Centurion, Honeywell, Eaton, and Siemens.
